info.title: Cosmos DB
info.description: Azure Cosmos DB Database Service Resource Provider REST API

get.description: Lists all the restorable Azure Cosmos DB database accounts available under the subscription and in a region.  This call requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/read' permission.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the restorable Azure Cosmos DB database accounts available under the subscription. This call requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/read' permission.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieves the properties of an existing Azure Cosmos DB restorable database account.  This call requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/read/*' permission.

200.description: The restorable database account properties were retrieved successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Retrieves continuous backup information for a container resource.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The name of the continuous backup restore location.

200.description: The Sql container retrieve backup information operation completed successfully.

202.description: The sql container retrieve backup information operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB SQL databases under the restorable account.  This helps in scenario where database was accidentally deleted to get the deletion time.  This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB SQL containers under a specific database.  This helps in scenario where container was accidentally deleted.  This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Return a list of database and container combo that exist on the account at the given timestamp and location. This helps in scenarios to validate what resources exist at given timestamp and location. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Retrieves continuous backup information for a Mongodb collection.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The name of the continuous backup restore location.

200.description: The Mongodb collection retrieve backup information operation completed successfully.

202.description: The Mongodb collection retrieve backup information operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB databases under the restorable account.  This helps in scenario where database was accidentally deleted to get the deletion time.  This API requires  'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB collections under a specific database.  This helps in scenario where container was accidentally deleted.  This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Return a list of database and collection combo that exist on the account at the given timestamp and location. This helps in scenarios to validate what resources exist at given timestamp and location. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Retrieves continuous backup information for a gremlin graph.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The name of the continuous backup restore location.

200.description: The Gremlin graph retrieve backup information operation completed successfully.

202.description: The Gremlin graph retrieve backup information operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin databases under the restorable account. This helps in scenario where database was accidentally deleted to get the deletion time. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin graphs under a specific database. This helps in scenario where container was accidentally deleted. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Return a list of gremlin database and graphs combo that exist on the account at the given timestamp and location. This helps in scenarios to validate what resources exist at given timestamp and location. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Retrieves continuous backup information for a table.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The name of the continuous backup restore location.

200.description: The Table retrieve backup information operation completed successfully.

202.description: The Table retrieve backup information operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB Tables. This helps in scenario where table was accidentally deleted. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Return a list of tables that exist on the account at the given timestamp and location. This helps in scenarios to validate what resources exist at given timestamp and location. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

value.description: List of restorable database accounts and their properties.

RestorableDatabaseAccountsListResult.description: The List operation response, that contains the restorable database accounts and their properties.

RestorableDatabaseAccountGetResult.description: A Azure Cosmos DB restorable database account.

properties.description: The properties of a restorable database account.

id.description: The unique resource identifier of the ARM resource.

name.description: The name of the ARM resource.

location.description: The location of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

RestorableDatabaseAccountProperties.description: The properties of a restorable database account.

accountName.description: The name of the global database account

creationTime.description: The creation time of the restorable database account (ISO-8601 format).

oldestRestorableTime.description: The least recent time at which the database account can be restored to (ISO-8601 format).

deletionTime.description: The time at which the restorable database account has been deleted (ISO-8601 format).

apiType.description: The API type of the restorable database account.

restorableLocations.description: List of regions where the of the database account can be restored from.

ApiType.description: Enum to indicate the API type of the restorable database account.

RestorableLocationResource.description: Properties of the regional restorable account.

locationName.description: The location of the regional restorable account.

regionalDatabaseAccountInstanceId.description: The instance id of the regional restorable account.

creationTime.description: The creation time of the regional restorable database account (ISO-8601 format).

deletionTime.description: The time at which the regional restorable database account has been deleted (ISO-8601 format).

locationParameter.description: Cosmos DB region, with spaces between words and each word capitalized.
